  17. #include "nodes/value.h"

  19. /*
  20. *    makeInteger
  21. */
  22. Integer *
  23. ‌makeInteger(int i)
  24. {
  25.     Integer    *v = makeNode(Integer);

  27.     v->ival = i;
  28.     return v;
  29. }

  31. /*
  32. *    makeFloat
  33. *
  34. * Caller is responsible for passing a palloc'd string.
  35. */
  36. Float *
  37. ‌makeFloat(char *numericStr)
  38. {
  39.     Float       *v = makeNode(Float);

  41.     v->fval = numericStr;
  42.     return v;
  43. }

  45. /*
  46. *    makeBoolean
  47. */
  48. Boolean *
  49. ‌makeBoolean(bool val)
  50. {
  51.     Boolean    *v = makeNode(Boolean);

  53.     v->boolval = val;
  54.     return v;
  55. }

  57. /*
  58. *    makeString
  59. *
  60. * Caller is responsible for passing a palloc'd string.
  61. */
  62. String *
  63. ‌makeString(char *str)
  64. {
  65.     String       *v = makeNode(String);

  67.     v->sval = str;
  68.     return v;
  69. }

  71. /*
  72. *    makeBitString
  73. *
  74. * Caller is responsible for passing a palloc'd string.
  75. */
  76. BitString *
  77. ‌makeBitString(char *str)
  78. {
  79.     BitString  *v = makeNode(BitString);

  81.     v->bsval = str;
  82.     return v;
  83. }
